alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jewell, Clay, Nuckolls, eastern Webster, southeastern Adams, Fillmore and Thayer Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lushton to near Mankato. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mankato around 730 PM CDT. Montrose around 740 PM CDT. Jewell around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fairmont, Randall, Geneva and Exeter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster
